text: This is a list of airports in Liberia, sorted by location. __TOC__ == Airports == Airport names shown in bold indicate the airport has scheduled service on commercial airlines. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- valign=baseline ! style="text-align:left;" | City served ! style="text-align:left;" | ICAO ! style="text-align:left;" | IATA ! style="text-align:left;" | Airport name |- valign=top | Buchanan | GLBU | UCN | Buchanan Airport |- valign=top | Buchanan | GLLB | | Lamco Airport |- valign=top | Harper (Cape Palmas) | GLCP | CPA | Cape Palmas Airport |- valign=top | Foya | | FOY | Foya Airport |- valign=top | Greenville | GLGE | SNI | Greenville/Sinoe Airport |- valign=top | Harbel | GLRB | ROB | Roberts International Airport |- valign=top | Monrovia | GLMR | MLW | Spriggs Payne Airport |- valign=top | Nimba | GLNA | NIA | Nimba Airport |- valign=top | Sasstown | GLST | SAZ | Sasstown Airport |- valign=top | Tchien | GLTN | THC | Tchien Airport |- valign=top | Voinjama | GLVA | VOI | Voinjama Airport |} == See also == * Transport in Liberia * List of airports by ICAO code: G#GL - Liberia * Wikipedia: WikiProject Aviation/Airline destination lists: Africa#Liberia == References == * * - includes IATA codes * Great Circle Mapper: Liberia - IATA and ICAO codes * World Aero Data: Liberia - ICAO codes Liberia Airports Airports Liberia
